#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long ll;
ll mode=10000007;
ll power(ll x,ll n)
{
	ll p;
	if(n==1)
	{
			return x;
	}
	else if(n%2==0)
	{
		p=power((x*x)%mode,n/2);
		p=p%mode;
		return p;
	}
	else
	{
		p=x*power((x*x)%mode,(n-1)/2);
		p=p%mode;
		return p;
	}
}
 
int main()
{
    ll t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        if(n%2)
            printf("%lld\n",power(2,n)-1);
        else
            printf("%lld\n",power(2,n)+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
